definition: to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

sentences.english: He collects specializing in various rabbit-hole story.
sentences.chinese: 他樂衷於彙集各類光怪陸離的故事。

sentences.english: They splashed the wall with different colours.
sentences.chinese: 他們把牆上塗抹得光怪陸離。

sentences.english: Nothing could be more bizarre and at the same time more motley than this troop.
sentences.chinese: 沒有什麼比這種隊伍更奇特和光怪陸離的了。

sentences.english: The tall, pointed windows glow in a thousand colours;
sentences.chinese: 還有，一扇扇尖形長窗，盡是光怪陸離。

sentences.english: This bizarre episode left us civil servants scratching our heads.
sentences.chinese: 光怪陸離的劇情讓我們公務員丈二和尚摸不着頭腦。
那是一種光怪陸離的雜拌兒。

sentences.english: The bazaar was a kaleidoscope of strange sights and impressions.
sentences.chinese: 那是一種光怪陸離的雜拌兒。

sentences.english: It was imaginative waistcoat with exceedingly fanciful glass buttons.
sentences.chinese: 花哨的坎肩上配搭着一些光怪陸離的玻璃鈕釦。

definition: lit. you hoodwink me and I cheat you (idiom); fig. mutual deception/each tries to outwit the other/dog eats dog and devil take the hindmost
universally shocking/to offend the whole of society
joys and sorrows/partings and reunions/the vicissitudes of life
living spirit, living image (idiom); true to life/vivid and realistic
ordinary and mediocre (idiom); nothing to write home about

dramatic form consisting of historical narration/history as jocular narrative/to stretch history for a joking story/amusing story with strained interpretations of history/to make an unreasonable comparison in jest
